content.body: Ian Hickson: please fix live DOM viewer :). Or open source it somewhere so we can host our own.
content.formatted_body: Ian Hickson: please fix live DOM viewer :). Or open source it somewhere so we can host our own.

content.body: In the meantime, I like https://livedom.bentkowski.info/ a lot. It's got a "share URL" feature but that just throws the whole input into a URL parameter which might be a bit long and unwieldy
